Text: Thanks so much for all these movies.  A wonderfully diverse selection.
Is this a DVDrip or a BRrip???

Can anyone tell me pls how to I link the subtitles to the movie?  I read you need to name the .srt file the same as the .avi and I've done that without success. 
Advice appreciated :) Thank you!

Use VLC Media Player - www.videolan.org/vlc
 Name of subs file (.srt or .sub) needs to be the same as the movie file (.avi)
